Title: The Blue Lamp
Writer: T.E.B. Clarke (screenplay), Jan Read (original treatment), Ted Willis (original treatment), Alexander Mackendrick (additional dialogue)
Actors: Jack Warner, Jimmy Hanley, Dirk Bogarde, Robert Flemyng
Plot: We follow the daily activities of two London bobbies, veteran George Dixon and rookie Andy Mitchell. Meanwhile, young hoods Tom and Spud plan a series of robberies with Tom's girl Diana, a discontented beauty, as inside worker. But in their second crime, one of our heroes is shot, setting off a citywide manhunt. The killer is clever, but will he outsmart himself?
Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 nomination.
